title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.7 - Designation of horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.7 - Designation of horses

State Regulations

Each competing horse shall be equipped with head and
saddle numbers of a style, type and design approved by the commission. Coupled
entries shall be designated by the same head and saddle number coupled with a
letter or letters. Horses coupled in the field shall be designated by the
highest consecutive numbers used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4117.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
